text: Gerald Kogan (May 23, 1933 â€“ March 4, 2021) was an American politician and lawyer. He was a Justice of the Florida Supreme Court from 1987 until 1998. He was Chief Justice from 1996 until 1998. He was born in New York City. Kogan died on March 4, 2021 at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American judges Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Politicians from Florida
title: Gerald Kogan
